summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Feather-Light Protein Hair Cream is a lightweight protein cream that provides flexible hold and definition without any crunch.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor flexible hold and definition with a soft, crunch-free finish. Helps to strengthen curls and control frizz.Formulated with rice protein, designed to help strengthen the hairLong-Lasting and lightweight protein creamLeaving every curl bouncy, elastic and full of lifeDesigned to help strengthen the hairFeaturesBEST FOR: Weak damaged hairFORMAT: CreamHOLD LEVEL: 4- Flexible holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643536How To UseApply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate , PVP, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Psidium Guajava Fruit Extract, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Lentinus Edodes (Shiitake Mushroom) Extract*, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Hydrolyzed Hemp Seed Extract, Opuntia Tuna Fruit Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Anethole, Benzyl Alcohol, Dimethyl Phenethyl Acetate, Geranyl Acetate, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, Citrus Aurantium (Orange) Peel Oil, Pinene.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
